```{r, check_commands, results="hide", echo=FALSE}
# check if necessary commands are present
cmd <- c("bash", "sh", "git")
r <- sapply(cmd, Sys.which)
empty <- r == ""
if( any(empty) ) 
  stop(paste("some commands are not available: ", paste(cmd[empty], collapse=", ")))
```
